hadiths.text: Narrated Sa`id bin Jubair:that he heard Ibn `Abbas saying, "If a man makes his wife unlawful for him, it does not mean that she is divorced." He added, "Indeed in the Messenger of Allah , you have a good example to follow

chapter.ara-name: باب {لِمَ تُحَرِّمُ مَا أَحَلَّ اللَّهُ لَكَ}
chapter.eng-name: "O Prophet! Why do you forbid that which Allah has allowed to you...?
